<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82310</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82310</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4810</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shape</string>
            <string language="es">Forma</string>
            <string language="ga">Cruth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Figura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μορφή</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet encouraging pupils to differentiate between triangles and rectangles thus practising their knowledge of 2D shapes.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que anima a los alumnos a diferenciar entre triángulos y rectángulos practicando así su conocimiento de las formas 2D.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre a spreagann daltaí difríochtaí a aithint idir triantáin agus dronuilleoga agus cleachtadh a dhéanamh ar an eolas atá acu ar chruthanna 2T.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ShapeSpace</string>
            <string language="es">Espacio</string>
            <string language="ga">SpásChruth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="es">Forma. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anregenzwischen den Dreiecken und Vierecken zu 
unterscheiden schüler des Bogens, die folglich ihr Wissen der 2D 
Formen üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élèves encourageants de tableau à 
différencier entre les triangles et les rectangles pratiquant de ce 
fait leur connaissance des 2D formes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alunos incentivando da folha a diferenciar-se 
entre os triângulos e os retângulos que praticam assim seu 
conhecimento de 2D formas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allievi consiglianti del foglio di lavoro da 
differenziare fra i triangoli ed i rettangoli che si esercitano così 
nella loro conoscenza delle 2D figure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που ενθαρρύνει τους μαθητές για να 
διαφοροποιήσει μεταξύ των τριγώνων και των ορθογωνίων που ασκούν 
έτσι τη γνώση 2D μορφών τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
